segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just standing there like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the kids climbing for cookies, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over, and she’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to get hurt if she doesn’t notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how unaware she is of everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to step in before something terrible happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
